description: Creates a new bill scenario to model potential changes to Amazon Web Services usage and costs.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A descriptive name for the bill scenario.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier to ensure idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags to apply to the bill scenario. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the created bill scenario.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the created bill scenario.

nested_items.name: billInterval
nested_items.description: The time period covered by the bill scenario.

nested_items.name: start
nested_items.description: The start date and time of the interval.

nested_items.name: end
nested_items.description: The end date and time of the interval.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the bill scenario.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the bill scenario was created.

nested_items.name: expiresAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the bill scenario will expire.

nested_items.name: failureMessage
nested_items.description: An error message if the bill scenario creation failed.
